questions.question: 1.What is the resonance condition for the series LCR circuit?

answers.a: The capacitive and inductive reactances are equal and 180 degrees out of phase at resonance.
answers.b: The capacitive and inductive reactances are not equal and 180 degrees out of phase at resonance
answers.c: The capacitive and inductive reactances are equal and 90 degrees out of phase at resonance.

questions.question: 2.What is the impedance of the series LCR circuit?
